name: The Adda Clevenger School
description: Adda Clevenger was founded to meet the needs of children whose demands for scholastic challenge, creative expression, physical activity and mental stimulation were not adequately addressed by mainstream programs. - Serves: Grades TK-8 - Enrollment and Student Body: 150 Students, Co-Ed - Fee-based Private School
